item.title: Rainbow Tables for md5 one way hash algorithm
item.dc:creator: Panggi Libersa Jasri Akadol

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
If you haven't got the time to use rainbow tables you could always try online MD5 crackers like http://www.hashhack.com , they crack in seconds that would take a normal computer hours.
Adam
